snippet: A bronze chest sealed in a Wall Street ceremony in 1914 was the world’s oldest unopened time capsule until Wednesday.
abstract: Bronze chest sealed in a Wall Street ceremony in 1914 is opened at New-York Historical Society, containing series of prosaic financial documents and telegrams; time capsule, the oldest on record before its unsealing, was intended to be opened in 1974, but was forgotten until its rediscovery in 1990s; society's student historians create new capsule that is slated to be opened in 2114.
lead_paragraph: A bronze chest sealed in a Wall Street ceremony in 1914 was the world’s oldest unopened time capsule until Wednesday.

headline.main: Contents of Time Capsule, Long Forgotten, Are Less Than Memorable
headline.print_headline: Contents of Time Capsule, Long Forgotten, Are Less Than Memorable
